articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Hurting Compatriots in London Olympics
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Hurting Compatriots in London Olympics
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 1006 Saturday.
					 The full text of the bulletin reads as follows:
					
					 The 30th Olympics is under way in London, UK.
					
					 The Olympics is the sacred festival of humankind desirous of promoting friendship and unity among countries and nations and achieving peace and progress.
					
					 However, the south Korean regime of traitors only is resorting to mean and poor charade as slandering the DPRK and inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen even in London, quite contrary to the noble idea of Olympics.
					
					 The regime carried to London riff-raffs and human scum, a group of wicked men serving the policy of confrontation with the DPRK, and held a "photo show on human rights in the north" in a street of London from August 5.
					
					 They put up pictures and photos distorting and fabricating the reality of the DPRK and independent life of its people, saying "they vividly show human rights performance in the north" and "they drew attention of London citizens and Olympic tourists."
					
					 The regime brought human rejects to the Olympics to escalate confrontation with the DPRK, not content with its attempted hideous terrorism for hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership. This is another grave politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and an insult to the Olympic spirit desired by mankind.
					
					 The world people are admiring at the high spirit and might of the country of Mt. Paektu which is emerging as a powerful and rich country under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Witnessing the reality in the DPRK in which human idea is coming true despite imperialists' challenges, personages of various countries visiting the DPRK are deriding rat-like Lee Myung Bak for going intent on hurting the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 Even the countries hostile toward the DPRK lavish praises on the successes made by DPRK players in Olympics who demonstrated the dignity and might of their country to the whole world while longing for their leader.
					
					 This meant a heavy blow to the Lee group who has worked hard to create the atmosphere of hostility toward compatriots through distortion and fabrication and render the situation extremely tense through reckless subversion and sabotage activities against the DPRK in a bid to mislead the public opinion and tide over strong protest of the south Koreans.
					
					 The history of Olympics has recorded innumerable cases that stunned human beings. But never has there been such a disgusting group of confrontation maniacs and traitors as Lee group which slandered the fellow countrymen even in the Olympics.
					
					 This clearly shows once again that the Lee regime is the wicked enemy of the nation that perpetrates evil doings until it breathes its last.
					
					 Trouble-makers should be removed immediately as they foster distrust and antagonism within the nation and invite confrontation and war.
					
					 The DPRK really meant it when it declared that it would wipe out those involved in hideous crimes and their backstage wire-pullers.
					
					 The south Korean regime will be made to pay dearly for its despicable anti-DPRK smear campaign.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounce S. Korean Ministry of Unification's Dream of "Unification of Social Systems"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounce S. Korean Ministry of Unification's Dream of "Unification of Social Systems" 
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification distributed badges of "Jar of Unification" at a "state council meeting" for passing the "draft amendment to a law on south-north cooperation fund". 
					 Those of the ministry made 1,000 badges calling it "symbol of preparation for unification embodying the necessity of financial resources for unification". They tried to give impression that they had done something for reunification. 
					
					 This is a disgusting action of sleep-walkers dreaming of a foolish "unification of social systems", Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a bylined commentary. 
					
					 Noting that the issue of national reunification is not a matter controlled by a petty amount of money, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Now all the members of the Korean nation unanimously demand traitor Lee Myung Bak repeal confrontation policy, not money. Owing to the confrontation moves of the Lee regime, the north-south relations plunged into a deadlock and big hurdles are lying in the way for cause of independence and peace and prosperity. 
					
					 If the south Korean ruling quarters have an iota of idea for national reunification to meet the aspiration and demand of the Korean nation, they should think about dropping the anachronistic confrontation policy and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, instead of getting concerned for "Jar of Unification" and "financial resources for unification". 
					
					 They are trying to bring down the DPRK which has the single-minded unity of the army and people with such despicable "Jar of Unification." It is a miscalculation and daydream. 
					
					 The DPRK's answer is clear as long as they are going desperate to hurt the DPRK, going against the trend of the times for independent reunification. The DPRK will mercilessly wipe out the traitors obsessed with confrontation of social systems with the united strength of the entire nation at home and abroad and surely achieve the historic wishes for national reunification.

articles.title: "Saenuri Party" of S. Korea Locked in Scramble for Power
articles.content:
"Saenuri Party" of S. Korea Locked in Scramble for Power 
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The presidential candidates from "Saenuri Party" of south Korea race to accuse each other only to be criticized by the public.
					 A joint speech meeting of the presidential candidates from "Saenuri Party" was held in Kimchon, North Kyongsang Province on August 9, according to the Christian Broadcasting System (CBS) of south Korea.
					
					 One from Park Geun Hye side grabbed Kim Mun Su by the throat even before the meeting started.
					
					 Kim Mun Su took the floor with the help of his attendants and spoke ill of Park Geun Hye while praising himself with the presentation of videos comparing his life with Park's.
					
					 This sparked sarcasm and abuses from Park Geun Hye side, and some even walked out.
					
					 Other candidates are also locked in fierce race of slandering.
					
					 The south Korean public was stunned at the melee in the inner "Saenuri Party" which is affected with an inveterate habit of resorting to every means and method to seize power.
					
					 The inner conflict has got unabated since it started when discussing the issue of deciding the method of electing candidates.
					
					 Dissatisfied with Park's aides holding the responsible posts of the party, several dissident factions of party insisted on their opinions as regards the election method which fuelled discord with Park.
					
					 As a result, there has been a row in the party almost every day and the friction culminated in the free-for-all at the meeting.
					
					 The "Grand National Party", predecessor of "Saenuri Party", had been accused by the public for the corrupt private life of the candidates as evidenced by the delivery of money envelopes for becoming presidential candidate and representative and holding key posts.
					
					 The GNP changed its name to "Saenuri Party" but it could not change the nature of political careerists.
					
					 If such guys are allowed to take power, it is clear how the society would become.
					
					 There is a Korean proverb: There are frequent fights in the reducing family.
					
					 The south Korean public assert in unison the future of the "Saenuri Party" locked in power scramble is fixed.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies to Be Opened in Pyongyang
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies to Be Opened in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The 12th national exhibition of inventions and new technologies will be opened at the Three-Revolution Exhibition from August 27.
					 The exhibition will see the participation of units and scientists, technicians, officials and inventors who made contributions to development of science and technology and economy and improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 Data on laudable inventions and achievements in developing new technologies selected from ministries, national institutions, Pyongyang and provinces will be exhibited in forms of actual objects, model, short essay, diagram, CD, etc.
					
					 Among them are data on significant inventions and success in developing new technology in stepping up the work to put the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis, applying modern science and technology to production and upgrading the core basic technology and applied science and technology.
					
					 The exhibition will include presentations of science and technology, lectures on technology and services for advanced products and technology and intellectual product exchange.
					
					 Preparation for the exhibition is making headway now.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jong Yong Chol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jong Yong Chol
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of KPA General and Labor Hero Jong Yong Chol, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly, expressing deep condolences on his death.

articles.title: Monument of Chinese Unveiled in DPRK
articles.content:
Monument of Chinese Unveiled in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- A monument to the memory of Chinese Zhang Jingrong was unveiled in Rason City of the DPRK on Sunday.
					 Officials of the Rason City People's Committee and people took part in the unveiling ceremony.
					
					 Also attending it were the consul general of China in Chongjin, government officials of the Yanbian Korean Nationality Autonomous Prefecture, family members and relatives of the late and foreign guests staying in Rason City.
					
					 Choe Ryon Suk, vice-chairwoman of the Rason City People's Committee, made a speech at the ceremony.
					
					 Chinese businessman Zhang Jingrong sacrificed himself to save three Korean girls swept away by sudden high waves at the Chujin bathing resort on August 15, 2010, the vice-chairwoman said.
					
					 She added noble internationalism displayed by Zhang would be remembered forever by the peoples of the DPRK and China.
					
					 After the speech, a red cloth was unveiled from the monument.
					
					 The son of Zhang Jingrong and Korean woman Jon Un Ju saved by Zhang made speeches.
					
					 The participants placed a floral basket and bouquets before the monument before looking around it.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestler Wins Bronze Medal in London Olympics
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestler Wins Bronze Medal in London Olympics
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestler Yang Kyong Il bagged a bronze medal in men's 55kg freestyle wrestling at the 2012 London Olympic Games.

articles.title: All Koreans Urged to Open up New Horizon for Peace and Reunification
articles.content:
All Koreans Urged to Open up New Horizon for Peace and Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued Sunday a joint appeal to all Koreans at home and abroad in the run-up to the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 67 years have passed since the Korean nation defeated the Japanese imperialists' aggression and greeted the day of sovereignty and independence, says the appeal, adding:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists have stretched out their tentacles of war and colonial rule from the early 20th century and the tragic history of division and conflict goes on even in the new century.
					
					 Last year Japan examined and passed the textbooks that justified its colonial rule over Korea and deleted the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and slaughter of Koreans in the great Kanto quake.
					
					 It indicated Japan's attempt to cover up its history of war of aggression and crimes against humanity.
					
					 Japan can not forge relations of peace and cooperation with any country without apology for the war of aggression and colonial rule and reparation for them.
					
					 It is foremost duty for Japan to make an official apology and legal reparation for all the crimes it committed against the Korean nation including the sexual slavery.
					
					 Japan should stop the distortion of history textbooks, acknowledge the war of aggression and crimes during its colonial rule over other nations and rewrite textbooks as something that implies its repentance of them to educate the rising generation in peace and human rights.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop all hostile acts and discrimination against the Korean residents in Japan and preferentially provide them with the rights to existence and national education and all other rights.
					
					 Japan should cancel its attempt to stage comeback to Korea including its territorial claim to "Tok Islets".
					
					 Tok Islets are inalienable part of territory of Korea in the light of history and international law.
					
					 Japan's moves to grab the islets and make them a disputed area can not be overlooked as they are aimed to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK and realize the militarist ambition for it and the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to wake up from its pipe dream and drop its claim to the islets.
					
					 It should also stop all the attempts to turn the Korean Peninsula into the theatre of showdown in Northeast Asia including the revision of "pacifist constitution" and overseas advance of the "Self-Defense Forces".
					
					Let us open up a new horizon for national reconciliation and unity and peace and reunification of the country by implementing the north-south joint declarations. 
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the efforts for implementing them helped remove somewhat conflicts and discords between the north and the south and open up a new era of reconciliation and unity. However, the past four years in which confrontation policy was openly pursued by the anti-reunification forces drove the inter-Korean relations to collapse. This caused a U-turn in the situation at home and abroad and resulted in a wall rising higher in the way for peace and reunification. 
					
					 Now not only the north-south dialogue but NGO exchanges and cooperation have been stalled, creating tense situation of military conflicts in this land. 
					
					 The present grave situation is attributable to the south Korean regime's denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and escalation of confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 However, no hurdles can ever check the nation's powerful advance toward reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 A key to removing the danger of confrontation and war and opening up new era of peace and reunification is in respecting and implementing the north-south joint declarations. 
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad!
					
					 Let us pool our efforts to open up the second June 15 era of reunification which is to be full of joy and emotion for reunification free from danger of a war!
					
					 Let us unite close and open up a new horizon for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declarations!

articles.title: ITAR-TASS Introduces Ryongmun Cavern in DPRK
articles.content:
ITAR-TASS Introduces Ryongmun Cavern in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- ITAR-TASS of Russia introduced the Ryongmun Cavern of the DPRK, underground scenic spots, on August 6.
					 The DPRK has lots of scenic spots one of which is Ryongmun Cavern, it said, and went on:
					
					 Its stalagmites and stalactites are fantastic and marvelous.
					
					 There is a 30 meters high waterfall inside the cavern.
					
					 Each spectacular work of nature attracts the visitors with their peculiar names.
					
					 The media appreciated the devotion made by general secretary Kim Jong Il to provide the Korean people with the underground scenic spot.

articles.title: Korean War Started by U.S., Russian Paper
articles.content:
Korean War Started by U.S., Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The 29th issue of the Russian paper Patriot carried an article entitled "Korean War: moment of truth."
					 The Korea war was ignited by the U.S. from every point of view, the paper said, citing facts to prove it.
					
					 It noted:
					
					 The war was apparently aimed at aggression pursuant to the U.S. scenario for world domination.
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists built up public opinion critical of the DPRK.
					
					 The heroic army and people of the DPRK turned out to repel the aggressors and defend the country, displaying popular heroism and self-sacrificing spirit.
					
					 The U.S. could not but admit its defeat for the first time in history.
					
					 Several decades have passed since then, but tense situation still prevails in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Now the Korean people are working hard to carry out last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, rallied close around DPRK Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The might of socialist Korea is firmly guaranteed by Songun policy.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Saber-rattling Slashed by British Organizations
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Saber-rattling Slashed by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on August 3 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime for their attempt to stage joint military exercise Ulji Freedom Guardian for invading the DPRK.
					 The war exercises, which would involve many U.S. imperialist aggression troops and huge military hardware, are part of the U.S. scenario to stifle socialist Korea of Juche by force of arms, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is to be held at a time when the hideous state-sponsored and politically-motivated terrorism to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK was disclosed.
					
					 In the face of their failed anti-DPRK smear campaign and psychological warfare, the U.S. imperialists have tried to put the DPRK under their control by force of arms and, furthermore, establish dominium over the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 We demand the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime stop all war exercises and provocations and make apology for hatching terrorist plots against the DPRK.
					
					 We call on other countries not to blindly follow the U.S. imperialists' moves against the DPRK.
					
					 We appeal to Juche idea, Songun idea followers in the world to extend more powerful encouragement and support to the DPRK.
					
					 It is our belief that the Korean people would foil provocations and aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Terrorism under Fire
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Terrorism under Fire 
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The anti-DPRK terrorism is not an accidental case but the manifestation of the premeditated plot hatched by the U.S. and south Korean regime to escalate confrontation of social systems. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article. 
					 Urging the south Korean regime to repent of the huge crimes which it committed before the nation through unprecedented anti-DPRK confrontation rackets before trying to evade the responsibility for the case with absurd rhetoric, the article goes on:
					
					 If the south Korean regime has common judgment, they would know the effect of their reckless remarks for confrontation of social systems and their consequences. 
					
					 While staging saber-rattling for invasion of the north, they mobilized ultra-right conservative gangsters, paid trumpeters, military hooligans and human scum to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its system. 
					
					 It is needless to say that such reckless actions have been carried out in a planned way according to the anti-DPRK war scenario worked out by the south Korean regime in alignment with the U.S. master. 
					
					 The recently disclosed state-sponsored and politically-motivated terrorism was prompted by the regime's zealous ambition for confrontation of social systems. 
					
					 They run the whole gamut of tricks to cover up their criminal nature. But, it is foolish for them to think that they can calm down with such absurd remarks the strong will of the army and people of the DPRK for retaliation.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is getting desperate in its moves for provocations as its end draws near. This is the expression of ignorance of the DPRK.
					
					 Even nuclear bombs can never break the single-minded unity of all the army and people of the DPRK who share the idea and breaths with their great leader. They regard it as the greatest honor and happiness to live being led by the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu whom they look up to as the father of the nation. The DPRK's solid social system is unshakable in any storm as it is based on the absolute trust in the leader. Thanks to the unbreakable single-minded unity and the solid social system based on it, any war threats and provocative offensive against the DPRK by aggression forces at home and abroad will never work on it.

articles.title: Bulletin on 67th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Published by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
Bulletin on 67th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Published by Bangladeshi Organization
						
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy published a bulletin "By adroit and superb guerrilla tactics" on August 6 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The bulletin said that Korea was liberated on August 15, 1945 from the military occupation of the Japanese imperialists thanks to the adroit and superb guerrilla tactics of President Kim Il Sung, the legendary hero.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who set out on the road of revolution in his early years to save the destiny of the country and people, created many guerrilla tactics during the period of the anti Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He won successive victories in many battles of the great anti-Japanese war by rare and mysterious tactics, finally defeating the Japanese imperialists and accomplishing the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 It noted that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for Korea's liberation will shine forever in the world history of the struggle for national liberation in colonial countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organizationa
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its internet website on August 6 the full text of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification."
					 The work, made public on August 4, 1997, clarifies the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed for national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. It also indicates the tasks and ways for carrying out the cause of national reunification on the basis of the charters.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Grafica Aj Hermanos Publishing House published in booklet on August 6 general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential For Accomplishing Socialism."
					 The work, made public on June 19, 1995, clarifies the idea that the basic task of ideological work in socialist society is to model the whole society on socialist ideology.
					
					 It also calls for abiding by the principles and ways meeting the intrinsic need of socialism.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Guinea
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Guinea
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea held a seminar on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on August 4.
					 The chairman of the Society made speech under the title "President Kim Il Sung was the great leader who performed undying feats in the cause of reunification of Korea."
					
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il in his work clarified the President's feats on national reunification, the chairman said, stressing that Korea will surely be reunified in the near future in the spirit of national independence and great national unity set forth by the President.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Society in a speech entitled "The three charters for national reunification serve as firm guidelines for Korea's reunification" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification-- independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity--, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo put forth by the President as the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 The three charters serve as steadfast guidelines for Korea's reunification.
					
					 It is thanks to the charters that June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was provided in 2000, ushering in a new era toward independent reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 A reunified thriving nation will surely be built on the Korean Peninsula as there are the three charters.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Reported by Myanmar Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Reported by Myanmar Media
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- A Myanmar media reported the main contents of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" on August 4.
					 The work, published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of 
					
					Kim Jong Il's patriotism and general secretary Kim Jong Il's career characterized by ardent love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies important issues arising in effecting Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
